section.name: Jetty
section.p: As some browser doesn't like you to play with local file, you may want to test your work through a web server. For example, if you use tools like the excelent -prefix-free, you may find it useful =)

To do so, we don't need to install anything, we simply will use command line interface (CLI) :
cd $PROJECT_HOME mvn jetty:run
Then, you can access http://localhost:8008 in your browser.
